body.name: USX Mount Tilting UL Listed TV Wall Mount Low Profile for Most 26-60" Flat Screen LED, LCD, Curved TVs, Tilt Bracket VESA 400x400mm- Holds Up to 99lbs, Easily Lock and Release to Mount on 12" 16" Stud
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 12 mins
features: UNIVERSAL DESIGN: USX MOUNT TV wall bracket fits most 26-60" OLED, 4K TVs Weight Capacity up to 99 LBS, TV brackets with compatible faceplate that fits VESA patterns 75X75mm (3"x3") 100X100mm (4"x4") 200X100mm (8"x4") 200X200mm (8"x8") 300X200mm (12”x8”) 300X300mm (12"x12") 400X300mm (16"x12") 400X400mm (16"x16"). Please check the TV VESA, TV weight, wall type, Stud size and possible blocked input before order.
SAVING SPACE: Tilting TV mount can get your TV as close as 1.5” to the wall creating an instant low profile modern and professional look for your home or office.
KILL SCREEN GLARE：Tilt TV brackets offers +0/-10° on wall mounted, you can no-tool adjust your TV where you want position for abetter view, which reduceing you glare and neck/eye strain.

EASY TO INSTALLATION: With just 3 easy steps, Easy to install this medium tilt bracket on wood stud or concrete wall by detailed instruction. Tilt TV mounts with One-piece wall plate design and no need to assembly. Just 15 minutes for finishing installation. The wall mount TV bracket included hardware pre-labelled bags. Pulling straps can help you easily lock and release your TV. If you need concrete anchors, please contact us to get it which be sent from USA.

PRODUCT INCLUDES: USX MOUNT Tilt TV wall mount is made of heavy duty steel by lots of advanced automatic machines. Come with bubble level, 3 pieces pack of cable ties and all standard mounting hardware, 10-year US-based friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: USX MOUNT Tilting TV Mount Bracket fits 26" to 60" flat screen TVs and supports TV weight up to 99lbs / 45kg, with VESA size available VESA 75x75mm to 400x400mm.
This TV Mount Bracket is suitable for various scenarios, such as classroom, home, meeting room and so on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we needed
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. We just moved and I was concerned that the TV on a stand would get easily bumped. Mounting on wall with an inexpensive, sturdy, simple mount was a great solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have installed a few of these brackets in my house from 75 inch to 43 inch. Sturdy and easy to install as long as you install into the studs. One happy customer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you mount this on wall studs for security
reviews.reviewText: I hung a 55 inch TV from my bedroom wall using this mount. It was very easy to do, once you find the wall studs. The design is simpler than other mounts I have used in the past but I found it to be very sturdy and secure. I was able to mount the four corners to the wall studs and I think it would hold a lot heavier TV than mine.Excellent price, and good instructions. I think this was the perfect choice for my situation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I liked the ease of installation. The level was a nice touch and it saved me a trip to the garage. Plenty of spacers and screws . Sturdy and I really like the tilt design in my bedroom. Tilting helps while watching in bed and saves me a sore neck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: easy to install, very sturdy, would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This product was easy to install. No issues with it. I don’t really like how the string dangles, so just wrap them up too and that takes care of that aestheticallly. I wish is tilted a little bit more but I knew it was only a 10 degree tilt as advertised. I used it for our guest room tv. It’s a smaller room and the wall that it’s mounted on is a small pathway… so I wanted the tv hung up at least 6feet high so people won’t bump their heads. It’s close to our ceiling now which is why I wish it tilted more. So if you’re going to be hanging your tv over 6 ft high… get one with a bigger tilt angle. But if not, then this one is a great value!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product holds an 50"tv easily, looks great, reasonably price. May order another tv bracket for another tv

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple but effective
reviews.reviewText: I bought four of these mounts to use throughout my house. I didn’t need anything fancy so I chose to stay simple and get these. I was so pleased with these mounts. They fit all the tvs I had and were so easy to install. They’re strong and sturdy and I love that they each came with their own level. They sit very flush to the wall or lean down just enough to see when they’re mounted a little high which is great since my kids beds are close to the floor so they can still see the tv when laying in bed. Highly recommend this for sure
